description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	

	New Feature:

SLIDESNET-34419	Support for scaling options of image added in slide shapes

	Enhancements:

SLIDESNET-31270	Hanging Bullet text indentation is lost when text is moved to second line
SLIDESNET-34519	Performance is slow and resulting file is too large when exporting pptx with large images into PDF
SLIDESNET-34649	Support for appropriate exception messages on loading MS Office files using Aspose.Slides

	Bugs:

SLIDESNET-24135	Reading and saving PPTM file corrupts the presentation
SLIDESNET-34115	Text Orientation is rendered improperly in generated thumbnail
SLIDESNET-34404	Wrong slide LayoutType is read by Aspose.Slides for template presentation
SLIDESNET-34414	SmartArt text is missing or improperly rendered in Aspose.Slides saved presentation
SLIDESNET-34435	Chart series labels are rendered in three lines
SLIDESNET-34497	CellEx.Height and Table.GetRowHeight returns inaccurate values
SLIDESNET-34527	Corrupted PPT is generated on serializing shapes in PPT
SLIDESNET-34570	Wrong word wrap calculation in TextLayout
SLIDESNET-34576	Scatter chart missing in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34577	Line chart missing in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34578	Legends are improperly rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34579	Text alignment is wrong in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34580	Chart category axis is improperly rendered in generated Pdf
SLIDESNET-34591	Wrong text wrapping in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34601	SmartArt shape background is missing in saved presentation and PDF
SLIDESNET-34602	SmartArt text is improperly rendered on saving presentation
SLIDESNET-34603	Vertical text is improperly rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34620	Chinese font are rendered as bold in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34625	Graph legend overlay property failed to retain in generated thumbnail/Pdf
SLIDESNET-34627	Exception: The node to be removed is not a child of this node on saving presentation
SLIDESNET-34631	Wrong font rendered in exported XPS
SLIDESNET-34633	Text rendered outside of the shape in generated XPS
SLIDESNET-34651	Bullets are rendered improperly in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34655	Master is improperly applied on cloned slides
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
